properties.description:
Name : Nextpathway
Date : 03/06/2023
Description : Pulls data from Azure SQL and Upsert data in SFDC-Contact table

activities.name: cd-CONTACT
activities.description: Pulls data from Azure SQL and loads to Salesforce

source.sqlReaderQuery:
with REGISTERED_INDIVIDUAL
as
(select RI.PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        RI.OFFICE_PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        RI.FIRM_PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        RI.REL_OFFICE_PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        RI.REL_FIRM_PARTY_ROLE_ID,
        RI.TITLE_ID,
        STAGE_CDI.F_INITCAP(RI.FORENAME) as FORENAME, 
        STAGE_CDI.F_INITCAP(RI.SURNAME) as SURNAME,
        RI.INDIVIDUAL_REFERENCE_NUMBER, 
        RI.STATUS, 
        RI.FIRM_REFERENCE_NUMBER, 
        RI.ACCOUNT_NUMBER, 
        RI.ACCOUNT_STATUS, 
        RI.JOB_TITLE_ID,
        case 
         when RI.ADDRESS_LINE_1 is null then 
          null 
         else STAGE_CDI.F_INITCAP(STAGE_CDI.F_DEPERSONALISE(RI.ADDRESS_LINE_1)) 
        end as ADDRESS_LINE_1, 
        case
         when RI.ADDRESS_LINE_2 is null then 
          null 
         else STAGE_CDI.F_INITCAP(STAGE_CDI.F_DEPERSONALISE(RI.ADDRESS_LINE_2)) 
        end as ADDRESS_LINE_2,
        case 
         when RI.ADDRESS_LINE_3 is null then 
          null 
         else STAGE_CDI.F_INITCAP(STAGE_CDI.F_DEPERSONALISE(RI.ADDRESS_LINE_3)) 
        end as ADDRESS_LINE_3,
        case 
         when RI.ADDRESS_LINE_4 is null then 
          null 
         else STAGE_CDI.F_INITCAP(STAGE_CDI.F_DEPERSONALISE(RI.ADDRESS_LINE_4)) 
        end as ADDRESS_LINE_4,
        case 
         when RI.POSTCODE is null then 
          null 
         else STAGE_CDI.F_DEPERSONALISE(RI.POSTCODE) 
        end as POSTCODE, 
        RI.RECORD_DELETE_IND,
        RI.UPDATE_DATE_TIME,
        case 
         when ltrim(rtrim(RI.SURNAME)) is null then
            1
         else
            0
        end as LASTNAME_VAL_IND
   from STAGE_CDI.DPDB_REGISTERED_INDIVIDUAL_STG RI
  where ((select PARAMETER_VALUE_DT 
            from STAGE_CDI.BATCH_PARAMETER
           where PROCESS_NAME = 'p_CDI-SFDC_CONTACT' 
             and PARAMETER_NAME = 'prm_EXTRACTDT') = '1900-01-01 01:00:00' 
        and RI.STATUS = 'A' 
        and RI.ACCOUNT_STATUS = 'A' 
        )
     or (   (select PARAMETER_VALUE_DT 
               from STAGE_CDI.BATCH_PARAMETER
              where PROCESS_NAME = 'p_CDI-SFDC_CONTACT'  
                and PARAMETER_NAME = 'prm_EXTRACTDT') != '1900-01-01 01:00:00' 
        and RI.UPDATE_DATE_TIME > (select PARAMETER_VALUE_DT as PRM_EXTRACTDT
                                     from STAGE_CDI.BATCH_PARAMETER
                                    where PROCESS_NAME = 'p_CDI-SFDC_CONTACT' 
                                      and PARAMETER_NAME = 'prm_EXTRACTDT')
        )
    and RI.ACCOUNT_TYPE_ID = 'at_commto_sonata'
),
RI_CONTACT
as
(select SFDC_ADVISER_CONTACT_ID,
        PRU_AGENCYNUMBER__C,
        PRU_STATUS__C,
        PRU_AGENCYNUMBERSTATUS__C
   from STAGE_CDI.SFDC_ADVISER_RI_CONTACT_STG 
)
,
ACCOUNT
as
(select SFDC_ADVISER_ACCOUNT_ID,
        PRU_PARTYROLEID__C,
        RECORDTYPE
   from STAGE_CDI.SFDC_ADVISER_ACCOUNT_STG
  where RECORDTYPE = 'Business Account Office' 
),
REF_TRANSLATION
as
(select CATEGORY,
        LKP_CODE,
        RTN_DESC
   from STAGE_CDI.REF_DPDB_TRANSLATION 
)
select FIRSTNAME,
       OTHERPOSTALCODE,
       PRU_AGENCYNUMBER__C,
       PRU_INDIVIDUALREFERENCENUMBERALT__C,
       PRU_PARTYROLEID__C,
       RECORD_DELETE_IND as PRU_RecordRemoved__c,
       ACCOUNT_ID as ACCOUNTID,
       LASTNAME,
       OTHERCITY,
       OTHERSTATE,
       OTHERSTREET,
       PRU_AGENCYNUMBERSTATUS__C,
       PRU_DATAQUALITYCOMMENT__C,
       cast(PRU_DATAQUALITYISSUE__C as bit) as PRU_DATAQUALITYISSUE__C,
       PRU_INDIVIDUALREFERENCENUMBER__C,
       PRU_REGISTEREDINDIVIDUALREFERENCE__C,
       PRU_STATUS__C,
       PRU_TYPE__C,
       SALUTATION
  from (select RI.FORENAME as FIRSTNAME,
               RI.POSTCODE as OTHERPOSTALCODE,
               RI.ACCOUNT_NUMBER as PRU_AGENCYNUMBER__C,
               RI.INDIVIDUAL_REFERENCE_NUMBER as PRU_INDIVIDUALREFERENCENUMBERALT__C,
               RI.PARTY_ROLE_ID as PRU_PARTYROLEID__C,
               RI.RECORD_DELETE_IND,
               ACC_ID.SFDC_ADVISER_ACCOUNT_ID as ACCOUNT_ID,
               case 
                when LASTNAME_VAL_IND = 1 then
                '<Not known>'
                else
                RI.SURNAME
                end as LASTNAME, 
               case 
                when ADDRESS_LINE_3 is null then
                RI.ADDRESS_LINE_4
                else
                RI.ADDRESS_LINE_3
                end as OTHERCITY,
               case 
                when RI.ADDRESS_LINE_3 is null then
                null
                else
                RI.ADDRESS_LINE_4
                end as OTHERSTATE,
               concat(RI.ADDRESS_LINE_1 , char(10) ,RI.ADDRESS_LINE_2) as OTHERSTREET,
               case 
                when RT_AS.RTN_DESC is null then
                 RI.ACCOUNT_STATUS
                else
                 RT_AS.RTN_DESC
                end as PRU_AGENCYNUMBERSTATUS__C,
               case 
                when LASTNAME_VAL_IND = 1 then
                 case 
                  when LASTNAME_VAL_IND = 1 then 
                   'Last name is unknown'
                  else 
                   null
                  end
               else
                null
               end as PRU_DATAQUALITYCOMMENT__C,
               case 
                when LASTNAME_VAL_IND = 1 then
                 1
                else
                 0
               end as PRU_DATAQUALITYISSUE__C,
               substring(RI.INDIVIDUAL_REFERENCE_NUMBER,1,8) as PRU_INDIVIDUALREFERENCENUMBER__C,
               concat(RI.PARTY_ROLE_ID, '_' ,RI.FIRM_REFERENCE_NUMBER, '_' ,RI.ACCOUNT_NUMBER) as PRU_REGISTEREDINDIVIDUALREFERENCE__C,
               case 
                when RI.FIRM_PARTY_ROLE_ID = RI.REL_FIRM_PARTY_ROLE_ID then
                 case 
                  when RT_S.RTN_DESC is null then 
                   RI.STATUS
                  else 
                   RT_S.RTN_DESC
                 end
                else
                'Inactive'
               end as PRU_STATUS__C,
               case 
                when RT_T.RTN_DESC is null then
                 RI.JOB_TITLE_ID
                else
                 RT_T.RTN_DESC
               end as PRU_TYPE__C,
               case 
                when RT_SAL.RTN_DESC is null then
                 RI.TITLE_ID
                else
                 RT_SAL.RTN_DESC
               end as SALUTATION,
               case 
                when RI_FLG.PRU_AGENCYNUMBER__C is null then
                 1
                else
                 0
               end as UPS_FLAG    
          from REGISTERED_INDIVIDUAL RI
          left outer join RI_CONTACT RI_C
            on (RI.ACCOUNT_NUMBER = RI_C.PRU_AGENCYNUMBER__C)
          left outer join RI_CONTACT RI_FLG
            on (RI.PARTY_ROLE_ID = RI_FLG.PRU_AGENCYNUMBER__C)
          left outer join ACCOUNT ACC_ID
            on (RI.OFFICE_PARTY_ROLE_ID = ACC_ID.PRU_PARTYROLEID__C)
          left outer join REF_TRANSLATION RT_AS
            on (RI.ACCOUNT_STATUS = RT_AS.LKP_CODE)
          left outer join REF_TRANSLATION RT_S
            on (RI.STATUS = RT_S.LKP_CODE)
          left outer join REF_TRANSLATION RT_T
            on (RI.JOB_TITLE_ID = RT_T.LKP_CODE)
          left outer join REF_TRANSLATION RT_SAL
            on (RI.TITLE_ID = RT_SAL.LKP_CODE)
       ) SRC
 where SRC.UPS_FLAG = 1
